• Return!

SuggestTheSummerAway generates different summer activities to get to moving and having a blast in the sun. Whether it be a sport, hobby, or and outdoor exercise, we have a bit of everything

SuggestTheSummerAway was created during the Suns Out Hacks Out hackathon hosted by Major League Hacking. Where the goal was to create a project during the weekend.

Developed by Reily Maahs and Khanh Do

Reily's Github: https://github.com/Ryaaahs

Khanh's Github: https://github.com/KhanhDoHoang
